response.overview: At an east London house party, Red grapples with second-hand grief as she struggles to support Axel through the silent weight of his father's deathâ€” each scene revealing a new stage of mourning in a raw, dialogue-light portrait of love, loss, and emotional endurance.
response.tagline: At an east london house party, Red grapples with second-hand grief as she struggles to support Axel through the silent weight of his father's death.
response.title: BABY
